name: Speed and Accuracy Test
description:
Not satisfied with your score? Here are some tips:

* BE ACCURATE WITH YOUR CLICKS. Click exactly where you’re supposed to. Clicking the background and not the subject will deduct points

* GO AS FAST AS POSSIBLE! Especially for the first 3 mini games 

* Don’t double click. Double clicking can result the game to think you clicked in the wrong spot  

* When clicking on boxes, aim for the center of the box

* You won’t get your perfect score first try. Practice makes perfect!

MINI GAMES:

—————————————————
The minigames are pretty fast pased, so you should probably know what they are before you start! These short 4  mini games are to test your speed and accuracy. 

MINI GAME 1: Click the box as many times as you can before the time runs out

MINI GAME 2: Click to stop the spinning wheels

MINI GAME 3: Click as many boxes as you can. But don't click the red ones!

MINI GAME 4: Click as soon as the square in the center is red

Once you finish these, you will recieve a score based on how well you've done!
